resources.string: Make connections easily. Thank you for testing. Lorem ipsum.

"Friendly is a WIP project that—i hope—will be finished as soon as it posssible. Making some long welcome text to this look a little bit complete.

For now we only support only sign up feature for testing purposes. That means that currently after sign up you won't be able to sign in to your account when you reset this app or try launching it on another device.
 "
Friend token has been expired. Try generating new QR code
You should authorize to start adding friends
Success. Soon here would be navigation to the user you were added, but for now you can go home

You should authorize before you be able to see your network
Add more friends and ask them to add their friends to make feed more interesting
Add them via QR code to extend your network
